welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spout Springs, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Simmons AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Simmons AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pinehurst-S. Pines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pinehurst-S. Pines Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
